mean_cn: n. 前景，最显著的位置
mean_en: the part of a scene or picture that is nearest to and in front of the viewer
word_etyma: fore前面，预先+ground范围，土地→前景
short_phrase: A woman is in the foreground.
sentence: A woman is doing Yoga in the foreground, while the sun rises in the background.
sentence_trans: 一个女人在前面练瑜伽，同时太阳从她背后升起。
